amendment.description: Amendment transfers $2 million in order to provide additional funds for the National Marine Sactuaries Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to transfer $2 million from the "Promote and Develop Fishery Products" account to the NOAA "Operations, Research, and Facilities" Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
